actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution relating to the commemoration of Citizenship Day and Constitution Week.

summary.text: Provides for the commemoration of September 17, 1975, as Citizenship Day and of Constitution Week by the Senate. Directs that such commemoration shall include a reading of the preamble and article one of the Constitution as well as a symbolic rededication by the members of the Senate to the Constitution.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the commemoration of Citizenship Day and Constitution Week.
